Headline: No Trains Between 47th/Dan Ryan and 63rd/Dan Ryan
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between47th/Dan Ryan and 63rd/Dan Ryan due to police department activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 47th/Dan Ryan and 63rd/Dan Ryan due to police department activity.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Howard and 47th, and,
  • between 63rd and 95th, only.

Shuttle buses are available between 47th/Dan Ryan and 63rd/Dan Ryan to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

  • #29 State
  • #55 Garfield

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
